CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7210SAST","The 7210 SAS-T chassis provides three power module options: –48Vdc, +24Vdc and AC. CustomField.label: PSU Information
